name: naringenin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3'-hydroxylating)
definition: Naringenin + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Eriodictyol + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: flavonoid 3'-hydroxylase flavonoid 3'-monooxygenase first step of two-step reaction (see R02443, R02442+R04902)
